attributes.action: Honour all members of England's women Euro 2022 cup winning squad
attributes.additional_details: The Government should recognise all of the Lionessess from the successful Euro 2022 squad. The honours Committee has failed to recognise that winning a tournament is a team game.
attributes.background: Calls on the Honours Committee to recognise all of the squad who won the first national football tournament in 56 years.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
